name: Notepad++
description: Notepad++ is a open source text editor for Windows operating systems and is not compatible with macOS or Linux. It has many upsides and is one of the most used text editors by Windows users, some of the features that it offers is multiple tabs in a single window so you can work on multiple things at once. Many people do not like the plain basic feel of the text editor but it has it's ups and downs it is reliable but simple. It was written with C++ by Don Ho in September 2003. The initial release of Notepad++ was 24 Novemember 2003. The most recent and stable release was 16 August 2017.
